trans-unit.source: Describes the chain of callers leading up to the current method call.
Gets a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityCallers"></xref> object that describes the caller.
Callers accesses the `Callers` item in the `ISecurityCallContext` collection in COM+.
The <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityCallers"></xref> object that describes the caller.
There is no security context.
Gets a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityCallContext"></xref> object that describes the security call context.
The static CurrentCall property is the recommended way to access the security call context.
The <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityCallContext"></xref> object that describes the security call context.
Gets a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityIdentity"></xref> object that describes the direct caller of this method.
A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityIdentity"></xref> value.
Verifies that the direct caller is a member of the specified role.
The specified role.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the direct caller is a member of the specified role; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether security checks are enabled in the current context.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if security checks are enabled in the current context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Verifies that the specified user is in the specified role.
The specified user.
The specified role.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified user is a member of the specified role; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MinAuthenticationLevel" name="MinAuthenticationLevel" href=""></xref> value from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ISecurityCallContext" name="ISecurityCallContext" href=""></xref> collection in COM+.
MinAuthenticationLevel is the least secure authentication level of all callers in the chain.

The <xref uid="langword_csharp_MinAuthenticationLevel" name="MinAuthenticationLevel" href=""></xref> value from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ISecurityCallContext" name="ISecurityCallContext" href=""></xref> collection in COM+.

Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_NumCallers" name="NumCallers" href=""></xref> value from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ISecurityCallContext" name="ISecurityCallContext" href=""></xref> collection in COM+.
NumCallers is the number of callers in the chain of calls.

The <xref uid="langword_csharp_NumCallers" name="NumCallers" href=""></xref> value from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ISecurityCallContext" name="ISecurityCallContext" href=""></xref> collection in COM+.
Gets a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityIdentity"></xref> that describes the original caller.
One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SecurityIdentity"></xref> values.
